[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays3ToDo,

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TodayToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TodayDone
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":400,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 	dj.[UserId], 
		dj.[User], 
		u.[HasImage] UserHasImage,
		dj.Name,
		dj.[Project], 
		convert(Date, dj.[Date]) as Date,
		cc.Name as Client,
		cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage,
		cc.Oid as ClientId
from [CommercialClient] cc, Analytics.DatamartJob dj
left join [User] u
on u.[Oid] = dj.[UserId]
where 	cc.Oid = dj.ClientId and
		(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5) and
		dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 5) and 
		dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0)
order by dj.[Date]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":110,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select v.Client, v.ClientId, v.Day, cc.HasImage, sum(v.Done) as Done, sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select	dj.[Client], dj.[ClientId],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 0
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 1
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 2
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 3
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 4
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from	Analytics.DatamartJob dj
group by dj.[Client], dj.[Date], dj.[ClientId]
) as v
left join [CommercialClient] cc
on cc.Oid = v.ClientId
group by v.Client, v.ClientId, v.Day, cc.HasImage","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Media","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 0)
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 0)
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 0)
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 0)
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 0)
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0)
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 0)
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 0)
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 0)
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 0)
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 0)","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":110,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select v.Client, v.ClientId, v.Day, cc.HasImage, sum(v.Done) as Done, sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select	dj.[Client], dj.[ClientId],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 0
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 1
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 2
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 3
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 4
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from	Analytics.DatamartJob dj
group by dj.[Client], dj.[Date], dj.[ClientId]
) as v
left join [CommercialClient] cc
on cc.Oid = v.ClientId
group by v.Client, v.ClientId, v.Day, cc.HasImage","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: ola
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters: [{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as Date","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Pending Jobs
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":400,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 	dj.[UserId], 
		dj.[User], 
		u.[HasImage] UserHasImage,
		dj.Name,
		dj.[Project], 
		convert(Date, dj.[Date]) as Date,
		cc.Name as Client,
		cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage,
		cc.Oid as ClientId
from [CommercialClient] cc, Analytics.DatamartJob dj
left join [User] u
on u.[Oid] = dj.[UserId]
where 	cc.Oid = dj.ClientId and
		(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5) and
		dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 5) and 
		dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0)
order by dj.[Date]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: ola
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays3ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays3Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: ola
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TomorrowToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TomorrowDone
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Users
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":230,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select v.[User], v.UserId, v.Day, u.HasImage, sum(v.Done) as Done, sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select	dj.[User], dj.[UserId],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 0
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 1
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 2
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 3
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 4
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from	Analytics.DatamartJob dj
group by dj.[User], dj.[Date], dj.[UserId]
) as v
left join [User] u
on u.Oid = v.UserId
group by v.[User], v.[UserId], v.Day, u.HasImage","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: ola
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays1ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays1Done
from Analytics.DatamartJob dj
where Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]
